revised_title: Formation Mechanisms and Energetics of Fullerenes
tldr: The author discusses the formation of closed-cage carbon clusters, C60 and C70, in high yield from condensing carbon vapor. They analyze various mechanisms for this process and focus on the "pentagon road" and the "fullerene road." The author also highlights the thermodynamics and energetics of carbon clustering, emphasizing the stability of C60 and C70, and the importance of their formation mechanisms.
